From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To display the control plane information for the running configuration, use the **show running-config control-plane** command in privileged EXEC mode.
CLIs: show running-config control-plane [ cef-exception | host | transit ]

ParaDef.Info: (Optional) Displays information about the control plane host.
(Optional) Displays information about control plane transit.

Examples: The following is sample output from the show running-config control-plane command. The field descriptions are self-explanatory.

RelatedCmds.description: Displays the contents of the current running configuration file or the configuration for a specific module.
